  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/wap/")
public class PageController
extends WapController
    The WAP Controller used for requests to Pages

    1.0
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • isValidServiceFormat

        protected boolean isValidServiceFormat(Format format)
        Description copied from class: WapController
        Checks if the given format is usable for PUT/POST requests to the controllers service. This may be different services for different implementations.
        Specified by:
        isValidServiceFormat in class WapController
        Parameters:
        format - The format to check
        Returns:
        true if supported, false otherwise

      • getPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/{ContainerId}/",
                params={"iris","page"},
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestHeader
                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="iris")
                                                                                                                                                                          int iris,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="page")
                                                                                                                                                                          int pageNr)
                                                                                                                                                                   throws WapException
        This method implements the endpoint for HTTP GET requests to pages
        Parameters:
        request - The request the client sent
        headers - The headers of the request
        iris - The value of the IRIs query parameter
        pageNr - The value of the page query parameter
        Returns:
        A response object to sent to the client
        Throws:
        WapException - in case any error occurs
